issue.title: Issue #221

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Pull request for an issue #221. There were wrong line separators, so it seems like I changed files completely. Also, I've done a todo from `MkSearchTest.java:40-41`:

``` java
/*
 * @todo #124 Implement the test cases for {@link MkSearch}.
 *  See http://developer.github.com/v3/search/
 */
```

body: Pull request for this issue has been merged. I think the issue should be closed.
you didn't remove the puzzle from the source code :(
